name: Best Western Pichi's Convention Center
description: Open until 4 in the morning, this Guayanilla casino has a whopping 317 slot machines and 12,400 square feet of gaming space.

name: Casino Del Mar at La Concha Hotel
description: Located in the hub of Condado√ås nightlife, the casino at the posh La Concha Hotel is open 24 hours and is the hotspot to see and be seen

name: Casino Del Sol at Courtyard by Marriott
description: Open 24 hours, this beachfront Isla Verde Casino has everything from blackjack to mini baccarat, laid out in over 14,000 square feet of space.

name: Casino Metro at Sheraton Convention Center
description: Located in the modern Convention District of Miramar, the casino at the Sheraton Convention Center has over 20,000 square feet of space and is open 24 hours.
